SENSES.SENSE: a magazine that is published at a particular time<font color=blue> ex: The article appeared in the November issue. </font>
a subject that people discuss or argue about, especially relating to society, politics, etc.<font color=blue> ex: Public education was one of the biggest issues in the election campaign. </font>
the act of officially giving something to someone<font color=blue> ex: She was wearing the heavy blue jacket that was standard police issue. </font>
someone's children<font color=blue> ex: He died without issue </font>
a set of things, for example shares in a company, that are made available to people at a particular time<font color=blue> ex: a stock rights issue </font>
